In the `CP4WAIOPS` "Hamburger" Menu select `Operate`/`AI Model Management` 1. Under `Similar Incidents`, click on `Set up training` (Disregard the message `You don't have any data yet`. The similar incidents data from ServiceNow has been preloaded in this Lab) 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Next` 1. Click `Done` ## Run Similar Incidents Training 1. Click on the `Similar Incidents` card 1. Click on `Train Models` 1. Status should say `In progress` 1. And eventually say `Deployed`
